languages.text: "Пока — вряд ли. Но увидишь побольше смертей, и тебе действительно все станет ясно".
"I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."
languages.original_text: "Пока — вряд ли. Но увидишь побольше смертей, и тебе действительно все станет ясно".

traits.locale_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “我觉得你恐怕不明白，至少现在还不明白。不过，只要再亲眼见证几场死亡，你就真的明白了。”
languages.original_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."

traits.locale_text: “我觉得你恐怕不明白，至少现在还不明白。不过，只要再亲眼见证几场死亡，你就真的明白了。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Creo que no. Todavía no. Pero una vez presencies unas muertes más, entonces verás».
languages.original_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que no. Todavía no. Pero una vez presencies unas muertes más, entonces verás».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「まだ納得していないようだな。貴様にもじきにわかる。あと何度か死を目撃すれば、嫌でもわかるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."

traits.locale_text: 「まだ納得していないようだな。貴様にもじきにわかる。あと何度か死を目撃すれば、嫌でもわかるだろう」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Das glaube ich nicht. Noch nicht, zumindest. Doch wenn Ihr noch einige Tode miterlebt, dann werdet Ihr es sehen."
languages.original_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."

traits.locale_text: "Das glaube ich nicht. Noch nicht, zumindest. Doch wenn Ihr noch einige Tode miterlebt, dann werdet Ihr es sehen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Non, je ne crois pas. Mais ça viendra peut-être. Assistez encore à quelques morts, et là, vous verrez vraiment. »
languages.original_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."

traits.locale_text: « Non, je ne crois pas. Mais ça viendra peut-être. Assistez encore à quelques morts, et là, vous verrez vraiment. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Hiç sanmıyorum. Henüz anlamış değilsin. Birkaç ölüme daha şahit olunca sahiden anlayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "I don't think you do. Not yet, at any rate. But witness a few more deaths, and then you really will see."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç sanmıyorum. Henüz anlamış değilsin. Birkaç ölüme daha şahit olunca sahiden anlayacaksın."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
